sources.title: 1957 - Witness For The Prosecution - Testigo de cargo - Billy Wilder

metadata.Plot: Ailing barrister Sir Wilfrid Robarts is thrust back into the courtroom in what becomes one of the most unusual and eventful murder case of the lawyer's career when he finds himself defending Leonard Vole, a man being tried for the murder of a wealthy woman. With Robarts choosing to represent him, the two find themselves up against Leonard's cold-hearted wife, Christine - who, in a surprising turn of events, chooses to appear in court against her husband.
metadata.Writer: Agatha Christie, Billy Wilder, Harry Kurnitz
metadata.Actors: Tyrone Power, Marlene Dietrich, Charles Laughton
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. 3 wins & 15 nominations total
